PerfectNetExp.abs: pathology的翻译查词例句词组大耳朵英语 ... cheery 愉快的... jeremiad 悲叹, 悲痛话, 怨恨... recently 最近.
以j开头的英语英文单词 ... jeopardy 危险 jeremiad 长篇声讨文字，哀叹 jerkily 颠簸地.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: from French jérémiade, from Jérémie 'Jeremiah', from ecclesiastical Latin Jeremias, with reference to the Lamentations of Jeremiah in the Old Testament

sentences.sentence: "a jeremiad against any form of government"
